data.title: James L. Brown Obituary 2010
data.meta_description: James Brown, 67, of Colona, died Thursday, November 11, 2010 at Genesis Medical Center, Illini Campus, Silvis.    Funeral services will be 9:00 A.M., Tuesday, November 16, 2010...
data.text:
James Brown, 67, of Colona, died Thursday, November 11, 2010 at Genesis Medical Center, Illini Campus, Silvis.

Funeral services will be 9:00 A.M., Tuesday, November 16, 2010 at Esterdahl Mortuary & Crematory, Ltd., 6601 38th Avenue, Moline. Visitation is from 4:00 - 7:00 P.M., Monday, November 15, 2010 at the funeral home with a Fraternal Order of Eagles service at 7:00 P.M. Burial is at Greenview Memorial Gardens, East Moline. Memorials may be made to James' family for a fund to be established.

James was born on July 28, 1943 in Moline, Illinois to Lawrence Ethrum and Nina Marie Mee Fetterley Brown. He married Dona J. Jones in 1959 in Davenport. They later divorced. He then spent 14 years with his fianc√© Jano.

James worked in sales at Modern Woodmen starting in 1980. He currently owns and operates B + B Rentals with his sister in law Barb and late brother. He was a former member of Edgewood Baptist Church in Rock Island. He was a former president of Co Ed. at Edgewood Baptist. He was a dual member of the Rock Island and Silvis Fraternal Order of Eagles. He was a past president of the Silvis Fraternal Order of Eagles. He was an avid dart player at the East Moline American Legion. He enjoyed going out to eat, listening to Elvis and Conway Twitty. He also enjoyed his trips to Las Vegas.

Survivors

Fiance Janis 'Jano" Irwin Colona

Daughter Coni (Karen Hamilton) Brown Rock Island

Son James Douglas Brown Rock Island

Daughter Cindy (Rod) Helg Andover, IL

Grandchildren Nicholas Brown Spokane, WA

Brittany Helg Andover, IL

Great Grandchild Jayden Brown Spokane, WA

Nephews Larry (LaDonna) Brown Rock Island

Richard (Linda) Brown Geneseo

Niece Sherry Brown Rock Island

Sister in Law Barbara Brown Rock Island

Janis' Children Todd (Amy) Irwin Houston, TX

Joe (Bindy) Irwin Moline

Chocolate Lab Lady

He was preceded in death by his parents, son, James Lee Brown, Jr., brother, Larry Brown and Janis' son Drew Irwin. Online condolences may be expressed to James' family by visiting his obituary at www.esterdahl.com.

Visitation Details

Monday, November 15th, 2010, 4:00pm - 7:00pm, Esterdahl Mortuary & Crematory

Service Details

Monday, November 15th, 2010, 7:00pm, Esterdahl Mortuary & Crematory
